name: Artificia
description:
Artificia is a visual novel game that includes dating sim elements and branching storylines. Featuring 8 suitor characters (6 male and 2 female), the story is a main focus in the game, covered throughout the 5 “main story” chapters. Each "main story" chapter also features a "side story" chapter for each suitor. With over 40 endings influenced by the player’s choices in-game, the player can make moral choices that were influenced by our take on morality and ethics regarding robots, advanced technology, and mega-governments.

Follow Us
